document.heading: Personal Property Tax Amendment Act of 1986 Clarification Amendment Temporary Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-129, the “Personal Property Tax Amendment Act of 1986 Clarification Amendment Temporary Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-457. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 29, 1988 and April 19, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 6, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-178 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
